name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - X, Y, and Z | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Each question will consist of three or more clues. For instance, the three clues might read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid". You must come up with these answers. The first answer is the longest word, the second answer will drop the first letter of the first answer, and the same thing happens to find the third word. In this case, the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink". I want you to type in ONLY the longest word, so in this example, you would type in "Drink". Each answer in this quiz will begin with the letter X, Y, or Z.

This first word will begin with X.

Christmas - Ampere hour - White _ snow

Now the answers begin with the letter Y!

365 days - Hearing organ - Argon or Arkansas
In the past - Metal-bearing rock - Egyptian sun god
Belonging to you - Belonging to us - Ancient city in the Bible
Leavening agent - Cardinal direction - Aspartate transaminase

Finally, all the remaining answers will begin with a Z.

Tool similar to a hatchet - Wood cutting tool - It marks the spot
Sixth letter in the Greek alphabet - Seventh letter in the Greek alphabet - Thank you or Goodbye
Wildly mad - It does not matter which - New York
